segments.text: Mr . Charles , I feel that we have had a very pleasant talk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so too , and you have a general understanding of the company now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , your company is a big one in the field and has great potential .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What else do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to know about the salary information in your company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , how much do you wish to be paid each month ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope my starting salary will be 3,000 yuan a month if I become a formal worker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will give you more than what you hope .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? That's good news for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will have a six-month internship after you enter our company . During this period you can get 2,500 yuan a month , and after that you can get 3,500 yuan per month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can also get a bonus at the end of the year , and if you can keep working in the company , your salary will get a raise every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , how many days do we work every week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Five days every week , but if it is necessary , you need to work overtime once in a while
segments.speaker: S2
